overview:
QuadMo Solutions is a company focused on Employee Reward and Recognition (RnR) solutions and mobile gift voucher service to India.

QuadMo mainly focuses on 2 major solutions

  1. CheerVoucher - This is India’s first personalized mobile gift voucher service. CheerVoucher allows users to send a personalized gift voucher from anywhere in the world to India in the form of a SMS. It’s instant, quick, easy and secure way of sending gifts to India.

URL: www.cheervoucher.com

  1. Employee Rewards n Recognition - QuadMo’s profile consists of 2 innovative, exciting and easy-to-use Reward and Recognition (RnR) solutions, named:
    • Applaud
    • SpotLight Applaud is best suited when Corporates wish to reward and gift employees in a flexible manner and at varying intervals. Whereas, SpotLight is ideal for those Corporates that have a defined R&R policy with employees being rewarded at regular intervals.

Applaud and SpotLight bring specific features in order to cater to Corporate needs for customization, reward budgets and internal RnR processes. They have the following features

  • Significantly ease the work-load on HR and automate a number of RnR processes
  • Save significant costs to the Corporate
  • Enable personalized showcasing of the rewarded Employees/Teams
  • Incorporate an extremely wide gifting range across multiple categories
  • Allow every individual Employee to choose a gift of his/her choice
  • Ensure tracking of reward budgets and success of the RnR program

URL: http://www.quadmo.com/our-solutions.html
